text:
The Import usecase doesn't work because of missing namespace uri for
http://apache.org/cocoon/lenya/page-envelope/1.0

http://apache.org/cocoon/lenya/page-envelope/1.0: is not a registered namespace uri.

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Error calling continuation at
file:/C:/marquis1/Lenya1.4_3108/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecases.js:263:-1
at <map:call> -
file:/C:/marquis1/Lenya1.4_3108/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecases/usecase.xmap:97:39
at <map:mount> -
file:/C:/marquis1/Lenya1.4_3108/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/lenya/usecase.xmap:56:128
at <map:mount> -
file:/C:/marquis1/Lenya1.4_3108/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:309:105
at <map:mount> -
file:/C:/marquis1/Lenya1.4_3108/lenya-1.4.x/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:668:106

cause: javax.jcr.NamespaceException:
http://apache.org/cocoon/lenya/page-envelope/1.0: is not a registered namespace uri.

javax.jcr.NamespaceException: http://apache.org/cocoon/lenya/page-envelope/1.0:
is not a registered namespace uri.
	at
org.apache.jackrabbit.core.NamespaceRegistryImpl.getPrefix(NamespaceRegistryImpl.java:312)
	at
org.apache.jackrabbit.core.LocalNamespaceMappings.getPrefix(LocalNamespaceMappings.java:206)
	at org.apache.jackrabbit.core.SessionImpl.getNamespacePrefix(SessionImpl.java:1218)
	at
org.apache.lenya.cms.jcr.LenyaJCRSourceFactory.createFileNode(LenyaJCRSourceFactory.java:29)
	at
org.apache.cocoon.jcr.source.JCRNodeSource.getOutputStream(JCRNodeSource.java:387)
	at org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.source.SourceUtil.copy(SourceUtil.java:74)
	at org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.source.SourceUtil.copy(SourceUtil.java:116)
	at org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.source.SourceUtil.copy(SourceUtil.java:135)
	at org.apache.lenya.cms.jcr.usecases.Import.doExecute(Import.java:91)
creator: midha.rakesh@gmail.com

text:
This is happening because component configuration for LenyaRepository is missing
in cocoon.xconf. 
    <component class="org.apache.lenya.cms.jcr.LenyaRepository" logger="jcr"
role="javax.jcr.Repository">
      <credentials login="anonymous" password=""/>
      <jaas src="context://jcr-repository/jaas.config"/>
      <home src="context://jcr-repository/repository"/>
      <configuration src="context://jcr-repository/repository.xml"/>
      
      <namespace prefix="dc" uri="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"/>
      <namespace prefix="dcterms" uri="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"/>
      <namespace prefix="lenya"
uri="http://apache.org/cocoon/lenya/page-envelope/1.0"/>
    </component>

I tried to check this and I feel this is happening because of Revision 381340 on
lenya/trunk/src/targets/test-build.xml. 
Which says "
Set patch.webapp property to 'false' before starting tests. This way, the
property is handled correctly even if the webapp and test targets are executed
subsequently in the same process."

se should set  <property name="patch.webapp" value="true"/> by default in
test--build.xml

What are your views on this? 

Also have a look at Bug 40436 which is happening for the same reason.
creator: midha.rakesh@gmail.com

text: JCR integration is a goal for the next version of Lenya. Modification of Lenya 2.x to have proper support for JCR will not happen at this time. Thank you for your submission.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
